p: Back again, and with so much good to tell Nanny! I'm so glad I was able to be with you as much as I was. When I think of old Nei - and that's likely ot be any time - I tickle inside & feel him bundled up against me!
Dog on it! By golly! He's the preciousest little cuss since you kids were babies, and I'm so glad he came! Nanny & I talked & talked about him last evening. Wait till Nanny sees him!
I wrote old Meek, and I'm sure he won't cast me out.
